amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Economic Development Administration Salaries and Expenses account by $7,500,000 and to reduce the Department of Commerce Salaries and Expenses Account by $10,706,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Economic Development Administration Salaries and Expenses account by $7,500,000 and to reduce the Department of Commerce Salaries and Expenses account by $10,706,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 233 (Roll no. 206).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 233 (Roll no. 206).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Scalise.
